author: scamp
msg: added pomdependencies.xml and goal for dep html generation

author: trygvis
msg: Fixing MNG-623: "Improve the exclusion / inclusion of a dependency inside the
Committing on behalf of Stephane Nicoll.
Provides two new flags to customize ear modules:
* excluded ; if set the module is not bundle in the EAR file
* library ; if set the java module is considered as a 3rd party library and no
entry is generated in the application.xml
The patch also update the documentation.

author: trygvis
msg: o Correcting the groupId of the plugin.

author: rich
msg: Two minor improvements to the NetUI samples:
- In the Nested Page Flow sample, added an input/display field in the original page flow, to
show that its state is preserved when the nested page flow returns.
- Made the Choose Airport page flow cuter, with some real airport/city data that gets matched
